Letterhead.description:
Sub Brand - Digicel Business
This branded letterhead is to be used for campaign and product marketing collateral (e.g. anything where we are speaking to customers about what we offer as part of the Digicel Business portfolio.
This includes, campaign assets, sales decks, product one sheets, business specific events etc. in this case the Digicel Business logo will be used.
Letterhead.name: Digicel Business Sub Brand Letterhead
